channel.title: Need a tad bit of friendly help
channel.description:
Hey, I need a little bit of help with my server.
I know everyone has heard this before and is going to here it a thousand times more but i need some help on the itemdef and how to add them
If someone could help me out i would appreciate it.
Ty.
For instance: I can spawn a attack cape pick it up then it turns into a pair for boots?
